ModMetaData.name: RimAsync
ModMetaData.author: Ilya Volkov
ModMetaData.description:
Performance optimization mod with full RimWorld Multiplayer support. First performance mod designed specifically for RimWorld 1.6 that works seamlessly with AsyncTime!
⚠️ RimWorld 1.6 ONLY - Not compatible with RimWorld 1.5
Features: - Asynchronous task management - Performance monitoring - Smart caching with LRU eviction - Debug overlay (F11) - Auto thread limit detection - Full multiplayer compatibility
